title: Event Argument Extraction (MAVEN-Arg)
description: Document-level event argument extraction based on MAVEN-Arg (Wang et al., ACL 2024). Annotates event triggers with their argument roles including Agent, Patient, Location, Time, Instrument, and more. Supports both entity and non-entity arguments across document context.
